title: Security.lean Skeleton Completion
main_goal: Replace trivial placeholders with substantive proofs that compile without sorry

nodes.label: Noise Growth Induction Base Case
nodes.statement: For depth d=0, noise remains at initial_noise (no operations performed)

nodes.label: Noise Growth Single Multiplication
nodes.statement: After one multiplication, noise <= n1*n2*t + n1 + n2

nodes.label: Noise Growth Induction Step
nodes.statement: If noise bounded at depth d, then bounded at depth d+1 given parameter constraints

nodes.label: Noise Growth Main Theorem
nodes.statement: For d operations with proper parameters, noise stays below q/(2t)

nodes.label: K-Elimination Preserves Bounds
nodes.statement: K-Elimination exact rescaling does not increase relative noise

nodes.label: Bootstrap-Free Depth Bound
nodes.statement: With K-Elimination, circuit depth L is achievable without bootstrap when q > 2^(L+1) * t * initial_noise

nodes.label: Security Reduction Structure
nodes.statement: Define algebraic security via ciphertext indistinguishability without probability monad

nodes.label: Deterministic Security Theorem
nodes.statement: For any deterministic distinguisher D, advantage is bounded by noise/q ratio
